document_data.name: Sanbreean
document_data.mainbody: '''Sanbreean''' was a [[Red Wizard]] of [[Thay]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Sanbreean was struck down battling the [[War Wizards]] in the aftermath of the [[Marsember]] meeting of the [[Rightful Conspiracy]] in early spring of {{yearlink|1373}}; after they were discovered by the War Wizards, Sanbreean fought them in the docks of the city, only to be slain, as related by [[Narvo]].
